install.name: hotel_3
install.author: JoomSpirit
install.description:
IMPORTANT : Read the settings for this template

All informations is in your manual. You must double click on the file manual.html

You will find in how to configure the template, use the typography and the module positions for your modules.

field.name: myimage
field.label: Select a background image for the header
field.description: You can add your own image in the folder 'images/background' of the template

field.name: title_position
field.label: Position of your website title
field.option: Above the module image and centered

field.name: width_left_side
field.label: Width of left side (for logo and module Intro ) in px or %
field.description: Enter the width for your module Image in px or %. Default : 300px

field.name: website_title_color
field.label: Color of website title
field.description: Hexadecimal code color . default : ffffff

field.name: intro_color
field.label: Color of text for module Intro
field.description: Hexadecimal code color . default : ffffff

field.name: top_menu_color
field.label: Color of top_menu item
field.description: Hexadecimal code color . default : ffffff

field.name: top_menu_shadow
field.label: Shadow around the top menu item

field.name: width
field.label: Width of your website in px
field.description: Enter the width for your website in px. Default : 980

field.name: width_left
field.label: Width of left column in px or %
field.description: Enter the width for your left column in px or % . Default : 196px

field.name: width_right
field.label: Width of right column in px or %
field.description: Enter the width for your right column in px or % . Default : 196px

field.name: user1_width
field.label: Width of user1 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user1 in percentage. Default : 33

field.name: user3_width
field.label: Width of user3 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user3 in percentage. Default : 33

field.name: user4_width
field.label: Width of user4 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user4 in percentage. Default : 33

field.name: user6_width
field.label: Width of user6 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user6 in percentage. Default : 33

field.name: user7_width
field.label: Width of user7 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user7 in percentage. Default : 33

field.name: user9_width
field.label: Width of user9 in percentage
field.description: Enter the width for user9 in percentage. Default : 33

field.name: drop_down_menu
field.label: Drop down menu fixed or not
field.description: I recommend you to disable this option if the width of your menu is bigger of 980 pixels

field.name: width_item
field.label: Width of each item menu in pixels
field.description: default : 196

field.name: text_menu
field.label: Text in the menu button (small screen)
field.description: Only in small screen with Responsive feature enable. default : menu

field.name: colorh2
field.label: Color for title H2
field.description: Please set the color for article title H2. Default : 006d98

field.name: color_link
field.label: Color for title your links
field.description: Please set the color for your links. Default : c35d1e

field.name: font
field.label: Font for your menu and article title

field.name: responsive
field.label: Enable responsive feature
field.description: The design change when the screen resolution is less of 980 pixels : better for mobile devices

field.name: column_responsive
field.label: Display left and right column under the content in small resolution
field.description: Disable this option if you use a javascript animation in your column.

field.name: bootstrap
field.label: Load Bootstrap 2.1.1
field.description: Disable this option if you doesn't the extra features of Bootstrap

field.name: bootstrap_js
field.label: Load Bootstrap javascript
field.description: Disable this option if the website load another version of Bootstrap or if you don't use Bootstrap animation

field.name: jquery
field.label: Load Jquery 1.8.1
field.description: Disable this option only if the website load a more recent version of Jquery or if you don't use Bootstrap animation
